LinkItem.internal_link_text: Run the Hadoop samples in HDInsight
Run the Hadoop samples in HDInsight

MarkdownCodeBlock.code_block: # Provide the Azure subscription name and the HDInsight cluster name $subscriptionName = "myAzureSubscriptionName" $clusterName = "myClusterName"

# Create a MapReduce job definition for the TeraGen MapReduce program $teragen = New-AzureHDInsightMapReduceJobDefinition -JarFile "/example/jars/hadoop-mapreduce-examples.jar" -ClassName "teragen" -Arguments "-Dmapred.map.tasks=50", "100000000", "/example/data/10GB-sort-input"

# Run the TeraGen MapReduce job # Wait for the job to finish # Print output and standard error file of the MapReduce job Select-AzureSubscription $subscriptionName $teragen | Start-AzureHDInsightJob -Cluster $clustername | Wait-AzureHDInsightJob -WaitTimeoutInSeconds 3600 | Get-AzureHDInsightJobOutput -Cluster $clustername -StandardError
# Provide the Azure subscription name and the HDInsight cluster name $subscriptionName = "myAzureSubscriptionName" $clusterName = "myClusterName"

# Create a MapReduce job definition for the TeraSort MapReduce program $terasort = New-AzureHDInsightMapReduceJobDefinition -JarFile "/example/jars/hadoop-mapreduce-examples.jar" -ClassName "terasort" -Arguments "-Dmapred.map.tasks=50", "-Dmapred.reduce.tasks=25", "/example/data/10GB-sort-input", "/example/data/10GB-sort-output"

# Run the TeraSort MapReduce job # Wait for the job to finish # Print output and standard error file of the MapReduce job Select-AzureSubscription $subscriptionName $terasort | Start-AzureHDInsightJob -Cluster $clustername | Wait-AzureHDInsightJob -WaitTimeoutInSeconds 3600 | Get-AzureHDInsightJobOutput -Cluster $clustername -StandardError
# Provide the Azure subscription name and the HDInsight cluster name $subscriptionName = "myAzureSubscriptionName" $clusterName = "myClusterName"

# Create a MapReduce job definition for the TeraValidate MapReduce program $teravalidate = New-AzureHDInsightMapReduceJobDefinition -JarFile "/example/jars/hadoop-mapreduce-examples.jar" -ClassName "teravalidate" -Arguments "-Dmapred.map.tasks=50", "-Dmapred.reduce.tasks=25", "/example/data/10GB-sort-output", "/example/data/10GB-sort-validate"

# Run the TeraSort MapReduce job # Wait for the job to finish # Print output and standard error file of the MapReduce job Select-AzureSubscription $subscriptionName $teravalidate | Start-AzureHDInsightJob -Cluster $clustername | Wait-AzureHDInsightJob -WaitTimeoutInSeconds 3600 | Get-AzureHDInsightJobOutput -Cluster $clustername -StandardError
